text:
[Verse]
Lights in the city sky
Stars shining up so high
We dance until the dawn
Until the moon is gone

[Verse 2]
Echoes of laughter loud
Lost inside the crowd
Feet moving to the beat
Hearts racing on repeat

[Chorus]
Under the moon we fly
Time slipping by
Hands reaching for the night
Under the moon so bright

[Verse 3]
Dreams that we chase so fast
Making each moment last
Smiles that we hold so tight
Spark in our eyes so bright

[Bridge]
Whispers in the gentle breeze
Caught in summer's tease
Promises made so clear
Nothing to fear when near

[Chorus]
Under the moon we fly
Time slipping by
Hands reaching for the night
Under the moon so bright
title: Under the Moon
